alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 31 at 7:10PM MDT until April 01 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 222 AND 224... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 222 and 224. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache
